Hey everyone, 0.24! Been sitting on this version for a while. It's now using the builtin OSD and will highlight parts while hovering. Also fixed a conflict with the new reveal part hotkey which also triggers with LeftControl.

If you need to change the hotkey you can change it directly in the included source and use the build script to recompile. Only need to have Unity installed to do this.
